name: Dirty Dozen Brass Band
description: The '''Dirty Dozen Brass Band''' is an American [[brass band]] based in [[New Orleans]], [[Louisiana]]. The ensemble was established in 1977, by Benny Jones and members of the [[Tornado Brass Band]]. The Dirty Dozen incorporated [[funk]] and [[bebop]] into the traditional [[Dixieland|New Orleans jazz]] style, and has since been a major influence on local music. In 2023, they won the [[Grammy Award for Best American Roots Performance]].
